unnormalised: Hey folks! Solar rooftop subsidies are a game changer, no? Heard my cousin Priya in Bangalore got like Rs. 50,000 off! Thinking of doing it myself in Mumbai. Power bills are killing me, especially with the AC blasting during this heat. Wonder if there are any good schemes in Maharashtra. Maybe even enough to power my entire house and cook biryani with solar energy! Happy Onam, everyone! Time to check if I qualify for these benefits.
